Author: -Macaronis-
Text: Yeeeaaahhh. I started to lift weights 6 days a week and thought 1700 calories everyday would be enough. Booooy, was I wrong.

Author: halfwayamused
Text: You really do need a lot, a LOT, of calories when you're lifting though, to the point that it seems absurd. It's a common theme in bodybuilding circles. Plus, gaining muscle and fat at the same time is the most efficient way to build muscle, and the subsequently increased BMR will make weight loss easier later if that's what you choose to do.
